pkgmetadata.longdescription: python-aiml implements an interpreter for AIML, the Artificial IntelligenceMarkup Language developed by Dr. Richard Wallace of the A.L.I.C.E. Foundation.It can be used to implement a conversational AI program.Forked from PyAIML 0.8.6 (https://github.com/cdwfs/pyaiml) PyAIML (c) Cort Stratton
